messages.title: A STRONG & EXPERIENCED VOICE FOR YOU
messages.content: "PROMOTING YOUR VOICE IN WESTMINSTER TO GET THE BEST FOR THE VALE OF CLWYD THAT'S ALWAYS BEEN MY AIM"

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour Government has invested over £100m in refurbishing Ysbyty Glan Clwyd, building a £20 million cancer centre, new renal and heart units and is proposing a £2 million conversion of the Royal Alex into a community hospital. Labour will use the income from a mansion tax to fund an extra 1000 doctors and nurses in Wales.

mentions.candidate: I was born in the Vale of Clwyd and am honoured to have served the constituency since 1997 and very proud that it is my home. It is one of the most beautiful and famous areas of the country.

issues.economy: Chris secured EU funding for Denbighshire in 1999. The Optic Centre in St Asaph was built with part of the £200m that has been invested from these funds, creating hundreds of top quality local jobs.
issues.health: Welsh Labour Government has invested over £100m in refurbishing Ysbyty Glan Clwyd, building a £20 million cancer centre, new renal and heart units and is proposing a £2 million conversion of the Royal Alex into a community hospital. Labour will use the income from a mansion tax to fund an extra 1000 doctors and nurses in Wales.

housing.content: Labour will use the income from a mansion tax to fund an extra 1000 doctors and nurses in Wales.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born in the Vale of Clwyd and am honoured to have served the constituency since 1997 and very proud that it is my home. It is one of the most beautiful and famous areas of the country. I was educated here and taught at Ysgol Mair Primary School as deputy head teacher until my election as your MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Including asking the top 'questions' in Parliament challenging government and ministers on a wide range of issues which impact the Vale of Clwyd.
